places_to_visit.name: Victoria Falls
places_to_visit.description: Victoria Falls is one of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world. It offers breathtaking views and various activities, including guided tours and helicopter flights.

places_to_visit.name: Zambezi River
places_to_visit.description: The Zambezi River is the river that feeds Victoria Falls. It offers thrilling white-water rafting experiences and serene sunset cruises.

places_to_visit.name: Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park
places_to_visit.description: Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park is home to diverse wildlife, including elephants and buffaloes, and offers walking safaris and game drives.

places_to_visit.name: Devil's Pool
places_to_visit.description: Devil's Pool is a natural rock pool located on the edge of Victoria Falls. It provides a unique and exhilarating experience for adventurous visitors.

places_to_visit.name: Livingstone Museum
places_to_visit.description: The Livingstone Museum in Zambia offers insights into the life and explorations of David Livingstone, the Scottish missionary and explorer.
